title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 20, 2016  Mark the 25th Anniversary of the START Treaty at Minuteman Missile National Historic Site  Join the staff of Minuteman Missile National Historic Site for a weekend of programs to mark the twenty-fifth anniversary of the Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty of 1991 during programs on July 29-31, 2016.   March 10, 2016  Temporary Closure of Visitor Center at Minuteman Missile National Historic Site  To allow for the installation of permanent exhibits, the Visitor Center at Minuteman Missile National Historic Site will be closed to the public for four weeks beginning Monday, April 4, 2016. While the visitor center is inaccessible, visitor services, including Delta-01 tour tickets, will move to the National Grasslands Visitor Center, located in Wall, South Dakota.
